item.title: About
item.description: Ollie Pye Ollie is a Physics graduate and is currently completing his Master of Philosophy in Astrophysics. His research is focused on galaxy evolution and understanding how Active Galactic Nuclei (AGN) behave. In 2023, Ollie will commence a new role at the Australian Taxation Office (ATO) as a data scientist. Before commencing his Masters, Ollie was a data analyst for the Queensland Curriculum and Assessment Authority (QCAA). Outreach Ollie is very passionate about outreach and has been involved in a number events:

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to Ruthless Physics Welcome to Ruthless Physics. I have tried on and off to start a blog about astrophysics and I am hoping this is here to stay. Why Ruthless Physics? The name “Ruthless” originates from my Grandma, Ruth. She has always been a big supporter and is always curious to learn more, much like myself. What is Ruthless Physics? The aim of this blog is to make astrophysics accessible.
